summary.Title: Souchef for Denmark
summary.Presentation:
You like to be in charge and have relevant experience
You are fast working and thinking, and you enjoy working closely and efficiently with others
You thrive on high pace

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
• You like to be in charge and have relevant experience
  • You are fast working and thinking, and you enjoy working closely and efficiently with others
  • You thrive on high pace
  • You speak Danish and/or English  

If you recognize yourself in the above, it might be you we need for a period of up to 3 months between June and September 2022.

This year is Spiseriet Anholt's fourth season with organic brunch, lunch, and dinner – served outdoors in the dunes close to Anholt Harbour with beautiful views to the beach and the sea. 
In the evening the menu is homemade sourdough pizza prepared in our wood-fired pizza oven. Our signature dish is a self-developed potato pizza with, among other things, oil from spruce shoots and “Vesterhavs”-cheese, but we also offer other things like our own tomato sauce, delicious meat, and delicate cheeses from organic Danish producers.  

Your job has many tasks which vary every day and can be adapted to your abilities and/or wishes:

  • Work our important pizza oven
  • prepare breakfast, lunch, and pizza
  • delegation and planning
  • quality control, and stock managing

You must be eager to join a team where working and communicating together - and doing it with respect and a proper tone – is most important.

Furthermore, you need to be flexible and ready to help almost everywhere.

It is important to us that you create and serve with both personal and professional pride. We ourselves take pride in good hosting and proper treatment of both customers and staff.  

We offer a workplace in a unique setting where we are busy, but never forget to have fun and to help each other.

We offer salary by qualifications and the possibility of lodging. (Keep in mind that room and board is tax deductible - read more at skat.dk.)  

Do not hesitate to send us an application where you tell us why you are perfect for us.

We look forward to hearing from you.
